text: Billy Eichner (born September 18, 1978) is an American comedian, actor, writer, and television personality. He is the star, executive producer and creator of Funny Or Die's Billy on the Street. Eichner was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for "Outstanding Game Show Host" in 2013. He is also known for playing Craig Middlebrooks on the sitcom Parks and Recreation. Eichner is openly gay. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television writers Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Billy Eichner
